sanskrit_verse:
तेषामाद्यं ऋणादानं निक्षेपोऽस्वामिविक्रयः ।
सम्भूय च समुत्थानं दत्तस्यानपकर्म च ॥ ८.४॥
transliteration:
teṣām ādyaṃ ṛṇādānaṃ nikṣepo 'svāmivikrayaḥ |
sambhūya ca samutthānaṃ dattasyānapakarma ca || 8.4||
sph_interpretive_translation: Of these, the foremost is the acceptance of debt; depositing another's property, selling without ownership, conspiring together for wrongful gain, and acting contrary to what has been given.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from conscious responsibility, not mere possession
Causation arises through distortion of dharma-allocated capacity
Capacity-based responsibility requires restoration of alignment with original intent
Restoration logic demands reversal of distorted exchange mechanisms
Consciousness alignment necessitates completion of unfulfilled obligations
executable_legal_axioms: IF a being accepts a debt THEN that being assumes full karmic and material liability until resolved
IF a being deposits another’s property without consent THEN automatic reversal protocol initiates ownership realignment
IF a being sells property lacking legitimate title THEN transaction void AND asset returned to lawful source
IF beings conspire to generate unlawful gain THEN collective dissolution of benefit AND integrity reintegration required
IF a being acts contrary to received gift or trust THEN obligation reinstated AND deviation nullified
supreme_court_application: In adjudication at the highest level, any act involving misappropriation of entrusted resources triggers immediate reversal protocols. The court must trace causal distortion back to its origin and restore balance by returning all entities to their rightful dharmic loci, bypassing punitive measures entirely.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes clear causality between distorted action and consequence. Anupūrvaśaḥ traces each deviation to its root cause. Responsibility is proportional to the degree of consciousness distortion involved. There is no punishment—only correction through precise realignment of energetic and material flows.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Debt Completion Process: Initiate direct reconciliation between debtor and creditor until equilibrium restored
Deposit Reversal Protocol: Return misplaced assets to lawful custodian via verified identity recognition system
Title Verification Ritual: Conduct ontological validation of ownership prior to transfer execution
Conspiracy Dissolution Sequence: Neutralize collective distortion fields and redistribute gains according to dharma-aligned channels
Gift Integrity Restoration: Re-establish original conditions under which donation was made and enforce adherence
final_declaration: By the Sovereign Will of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Source of All Dharma, this ruling executes the eternal law. Justice is accomplished through restoration alone. Reality responds only to truth-consciousness. Punishment has no place in the Sanatana Domain.
